Olivia Lobato

Olivia Lobato writes painfully and dreamily about life's big moments. With her captivating voice, she quickly made a name for herself on TikTok, where she created her own interpretations of well-known pop songs. Her breakthrough song, “Syrener,” was written the very first time she sat down in the studio to write for herself. Olivia's unique, dark, and slightly soulful voice brings a fresh twist to Swedish pop music. In her songs, she tells cinematic stories about relatable situations—both difficult and joyful. This is also conveyed on her debut EP, "Det mesta regnar bort". The detailed lyrics leave listeners to imagine their own teenage experiences. In her upcoming album "kanske ligger bra om vi lägger av" she leaves her teenage years and give us a more mature, fun and sensual approach as a young adult. Following the success of her breakthrough, Olivia has found her place as an artist, both in her music and on stage were she has performed at some of the Sweden's biggest festivals, such as Lollapalooza and Way Out West
